item1:
盘点数量记录
Physical inventory count quantity record
item2:
记录实际盘点的数量
Record the actual inventory count
item4:
已完成立库盘点搬运命令
Completed the physical inventory count transfer out command
item5:
盘点编号、实际盘点数量
physical inventory count number, actual physical inventory count quantity
输出
item6:
托盘货物储存数据、更新盘点数据
Pallet article storage data, update physical inventory count data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的盘点数据，系统将提示查无可盘点信息
If there is no eligible physical inventory count data, the system will prompt for no physical inventory count information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入盘点编号后点选Query查询盘点数据
Enter the physical inventory count number and click Query to query the physical inventory count data
2. 挑选已盘点后的数据，输入实际盘点数量
Select the counted data and enter the actual count quantity
3. 点选Execute更新盘点数据
Click Execute to update the physical inventory count data
4. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
5. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
点选Execute后，有审批授权者执行C040 PIC Difference Adjustment
After clicking Execute, C040 PIC Difference Adjustment is performed by the authorized user
备注
